description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1iaj7","text":"This protocol describes the procedure to passage hPSC culture using enzyme-free reagents. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4c650","text":"In this protocol, hPSC passaging is done in aggregate/clumps format. The protocol is adaptable to different enzyme-free reagents described in Materials section and variable plate formats.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1664","text":"Pipette up and down using 5 mL serological pipette against the bottom of the well to dislodge cells from the culture surface.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8ea7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ldm3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9l0v5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fp7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2uv6t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":260}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2dkcn","text":"Repeated execution of this step leads to progressively smaller hPSC aggregates, which can increase cellular stress and promote cell death. Aim to maintain a balance that results in a uniform aggregate suspension - ideally with sizes ranging from approximately   while minimizing shear stress.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"50-200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4155},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"85uu8","text":"The use of scrapers is generally not recommended. However, for hPSC cultures with strong adherence properties, employing a scraper may be preferable to prolonged incubation with enzyme-free dissociation reagents.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bitgq","text":"Collect hPSC aggregates suspension using 5 mL pipette and directly distribute drop-wise the approximate volume for splitting ratios: 1/10, 1/15, 1/20 (or as desired) to the destination vessel/s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ktur","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3r988","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8p56b","text":"Alternatively, aggregates suspension can be transferred to a conical tube prior distribution to better assess suspension volume. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95a78","text":"Gently move destination vessels with freshly passed aggregates in cross shape to distribute them evenly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50iq3","text":"After   perform full media change. For further hPSC culture refer to protocol Maintenance of hPSC and protocol Reference pictures of hPSC cultured in defined conditions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":78,"length":19},{"key":2,"offset":111,"length":57}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9C2D3A3BA22E49EC9A7659A77E8B6BA7","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/maintenance-of-hpsc-c434yyqw"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D41476748E1D41059DBBA29DEAD8B47B","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/reference-pictures-of-hpsc-cultured-in-defined-con-c5c5y2y6"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agrb","text":"Aspirate and discard coating solution from wells of destination vessel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
